item.title: The "King" class role will be good OR evil, chosen randomly
item.dc:creator: suddenlyANerd
item.description:
I personally don’t believe lowering the chances of the King being neutral would be necessary. If you feel that the King being neutral would somehow go against the intention of how his abilities should be used, I would say you may want to consider not allowing the King to be neutral. I can’t assume what your reasoning behind suggesting that a neutral King be rare are, but otherwise it may as well be just as common as the King being a member of any other faction. I would definitely support the latter of my suggestions, since I think that a player with large amounts of power who begins the game with only an alliegence to themselves could lead to some very interesting games full of betrayal, intrigue and mystery (exactly what the game’s about), and I don’t think that such a situation should be rare.

Sorry for such a late reply, but I’ve only just discovered this project and want to share my opinion.
